'''''A Ruined Tale''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player first needs to give [[Fragrant Wood "Chizhang"]] and [[Fragrant Wood "Huangcong"]] to the Diffuser Inscription at [[Chizhang Wall]]. They must then repair the Ancient Jade Pendant inside using [[Jade Fragment (Left)]] and [[Jade Fragment (Right)]]. The player then needs to interact with the pendant and reveal the mural hidden below.
